substituted_name: Galaxy War Chronicles: Episode III - Retaliation of the Dread (2005)
description: In a galaxy far away, a young Jedi Knight struggles to resist the dark side while the Galactic Republic falls apart. Meanwhile, two heroes fight to keep a beloved politician safe from a mysterious threat. The fate of the galaxy hinges on their actions.
name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (2005)

description: A woman and her daughter move to a new town and open a chocolate shop. The delicious sweets have a magical effect on the townspeople, bringing them happiness and joy. However, the shop also brings unwanted attention and conflict with the conservative townsfolk.
name: Chocolat (2000)

description: A pampered house dog and a tough but lovable stray embark on a romantic adventure through the city, facing various obstacles along the way, including a gang of alley cats and a mean dogcatcher.
name: Lady and the Tramp (1955)

description: After a long absence from earth, the starship crew of the USS Enterprise are called back to investigate a terrifying alien force that threatens the galaxy.
name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture (1979)

description: The story revolves around Folks, an adult magazine publisher who gets into legal trouble because of his work. As he fights for his freedom, he becomes a symbol of freedom of speech and expression. However, his personal life is plagued with problems.
name: People vs. Larry Flynt, The (1996)

description: After being released from prison, a convicted rapist seeks revenge on the defense attorney who put him away. The attorney's family becomes the focus of the rapist's twisted plan, but they fight back for their lives.
name: Cape Fear (1991)

description: A righteous and steadfast Indian leader, Ganesh, fights for the independence of his country from British rule through non-violent means, inspiring millions in the process.
name: Gandhi (1982)

description: A young queen takes the throne in a time of religious strife, political upheaval, and personal turmoil.
name: Elizabeth (1998)

description: A young criminal is taken in by a shadowy government agency and trained to be a skilled assassin. The Woman Nikita (Nikita) struggles to start a new life, but finds it difficult to leave her old one behind.
name: Femme Nikita, La (Nikita) (1990)

description: An aardvark worker becomes disillusioned with his society's conformity and goes on a journey of self-discovery with the help of a free-spirited ant.
name: Antz (1998)

description: Based on a true story, a group of fishermen sets sail on a risky expedition for a large catch amidst an incoming perfect storm. The crew battles with the treacherous sea and their own personal demons, facing tough decisions that will ultimately seal their fate.
name: Perfect Storm, The (2000)

description: In this crime-thriller-war film, an American soldier is brainwashed during the Korean War, turning him into an unwitting tool for a conspiracy to overthrow the US government. His former colleague, played by Frank Sinatra, sets out to uncover and stop the plot.
name: Manchurian Candidate, The (1962)

substituted_name: Galactic Dunk: The Quest for Victory
description: In a basketball game against curious alien creatures, the Looney Tunes enlist the help of retired basketball star Michael Jordan to save themselves from being enslaved. Can Bugs, Daffy, and the rest of the gang overcome the odds and emerge victorious?
name: Space Jam (1996)
genres: Adventure Animation Children Comedy Fantasy Sci-Fi

description: A struggling playwright sells out for his chance to produce a play. When a hitman with a knack for the arts is assigned to watch over the production, things get complicated. Starring John Cusack and Dianne Wiest.
name: Bullets Over Broadway (1994)

description: Follow former marine and English teacher, Lou Anne Johnson, as she leads a group of inner city high school students to success. Watch as they challenge systemic apathy and defeat the odds.
name: Dangerous Minds (1995)

description: A former assassin with amnesia seeks her true identity while protecting her daughter from her past.
name: Long Kiss Goodnight, The (1996)

description: Our hero must stop a group of terrorists from taking control of a powerful weapon on a train. He faces both internal and external conflicts as he fights to save the day.
name: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory (1995)

description: Fuming Cow tells the story of a boxer who rises to fame, but his arrogance and violent temper threaten to destroy his career and personal life.
name: Raging Bull (1980)

substituted_name: Insanity of King Henry III, The (1994)
description: The story revolves around the sudden onset of mental illness and subsequent temporary reign of King Henry III. The political machinations of the time, as well as his family's attempts to wrest power from him, form the backdrop to this period drama.
name: Madness of King George, The (1994)

description: In this heartwarming holiday tale, a department store Santa Claus claims to be the real Santa and gains widespread acclaim, drawing the attention of a skeptical lawyer and the media. In an effort to prove his identity, he goes to court to defend his sanity and his memories of the North Pole.
name: Miracle on 34th Street (1994)

description: Two unlikely police officers reluctantly team up to rescue a Chinese diplomat's daughter who has been kidnapped by a dangerous criminal organization. Along the way, they unravel a deadly conspiracy and engage in high-speed chases through the streets of Los Angeles.
name: Rush Hour (1998)

description: A skilled thief and his team are enlisted to steal fifty cars in one night to save his younger brother's life. However, they face unexpected challenges as they try to complete their task within a tight deadline and avoid the attention of the authorities.
name: Gone in 60 Seconds (2000)

description: To rescue America's president, a former Special Forces soldier is sent on a mission into crime-ridden Gotham City, which has been turned into a maximum security prison, in this action-packed adventure thriller.
name: Escape from New York (1981)

description: A team of soldiers is sent to Somalia to capture two top lieutenants of a rebel warlord and find themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis. The soldiers have to fight for their survival in the chaotic city. Starring Josh Hartnett and Ewan McGregor.
name: Black Hawk Down (2001)
Spirited Away (Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi) (2001)

description: A charismatic aspiring writer is fascinated by his eccentric neighbor Holly, a charming gold digger with a heart of gold. As their friendship grows, he learns about her secrets and helps her find a better path in life.
name: Breakfast at Tiffany's (1961)

description: A US Army officer investigates a female captain's eligibility for the Medal of Honor after she is killed by enemy fire in Iraq. He faces challenges when he finds out she was going through a tough time while leading her team. The investigation reveals his own buried secrets.
name: Courage Under Fire (1996)

description: In a far-off future, young savior must protect Desert Planet from evil forces vying for its precious resources, including vital spice melange. Along the way, he faces treachery and danger, learning about his own true nature and ultimate destiny.

description: In Say Everything..., an optimistic underachiever falls in love with a beautiful and intelligent girl, but he's afraid he'll ruin it like he has with everything else. With the help of his loyal friends, he tries to win her heart and prove he's worthy of her affection.
name: Say Anything... (1989)

description: Several storylines intertwine over the course of three drug and crime filled days in a seedy part of LA, following a group of young adults as they navigate their way through the illicit underbelly of Los Angeles.

description: Two wealthy and manipulative brothers, Louis and William, decide to barter the lives and lifestyles of a down-and-out street hustler and a successful commodities broker in this comedy classic.
name: Trading Places (1983)

description: A skilled professional works as a negotiator, but when a tense standoff occurs between him and the police, he becomes a crime suspect. He must prove his innocence and unravel a larger conspiracy.
name: Negotiator, The (1998)

description: Ben-Him, a Hebrew prince in Jerusalem, is victimised by his Roman close friend and compelled into slavery. After getting freedom, he gets a chance to take revenege in a race that becomes a matter of life and death.
name: Ben-Hur (1959)

description: This comedic adventure follows Xi, a man from an isolated tribe who encounters modern human civilization for the first time when a Coca-Cola bottle falls from the sky. Along the way, he meets a diverse group of characters and learns valuable lessons about the world beyond his tribe.
name: Gods Must Be Crazy, The (1980)

description: Nightwing teams up with Batgirl to save Gotham City from the evil villain Mr. Freeze and his partner Poison Ivy.
name: Batman & Robin (1997)

description: A pianist struggles with mental illness while auditioning for a prestigious music school. With the help of his father, he overcomes his difficulties and becomes a renowned musician.

description: A Puerto Rican ex-con struggles to stay away from trouble, but trouble has a way of finding him. Along with his criminal lawyer, he attempts to leave behind his criminal past and start anew, but he finds that it's easier said than done.
name: Carlito's Way (1993)

description: Detectives Doyle and Russo follow the illegal drug trail from France to Italy.
name: French Connection, The (1971)

description: A successful psychoanalyst's life takes a peculiar turn when he is threatened by a gangster. He must seek the help of a dependent and disorganized mobster to solve his problems. A comedy of unexpected friendship and collaboration.
name: Analyze This (1999)

description: A housewife named Evelyn befriends Ninny, an elderly woman who tells her stories about two women named Idgie and Ruth in the 1930s, who ran a cafe called the Whistle Stop Cafe. The story revolves around their friendship, the cafe, and their adventures in life and love.

description: Two cops, one a loose cannon and the other retired, are forced to work together to solve a series of robberies involving stolen weapons.

description: A young boy in a small Italian village strikes an unlikely friendship with the grumpy projectionist of the local cinema.
